channel.title: Russell, Stuart on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Russell, Stuart on Chege's Blog

item.title: [ToDo] AI: A Modern Approach
item.description: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach (3rd ed.). Stuart Russell; Peter Norvig. aima.cs.berkeley.edu . Jan 1, 2010. Ch 01. Introduction to AI Ch 02. Intelligent Agents Ch 03. Solving Problems by Searching Ch 04. Beyond Classical Search Ch 05. Adversarial Search Ch 06. Constraint Satisfaction Problems Ch 07. Logical Agents Ch 08. First-Order Logic Ch 09. Inference in First-Order Logic Ch 10. Classical Planning Ch 11. Planning and Acting in the Real World
